title: U.S. per capita consumption of fresh lettuce ( romaine and leaf ) 2000 to 2018
summary: Overall Per capita consumption in pounds has decreased over the Year.

Per capita consumption in pounds is slightly decreasing from 2004 to 2005, slightly increasing from 2005 to 2006, roughly constant from 2006 to 2009, slightly increasing from 2009 to 2010, and lastly roughly constant from 2010 to 2014.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2004 and 2005.
Maximum Per capita consumption in pounds, about 12.0 was reported at Year 2004,  2006, and 2010
Minimum Per capita consumption in pounds about 9.7 was reached at Year 2005
